thread.section_title: DialAFlight Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.dialaflight.com
thread.title: Roy Romsey

author: Roy Romsey
title: Roy Romsey
text:
Your comment and support regarding about B.A.Free Meals is misplaced. B.A.does not give Free Meals, the meals are paid for within the fare structure. they are inclusive meals' and have been so since day one.
Your assertion that passengers do not expect bus and trains to include meals is because they have always charged the lowest fares possible for mass transport and as such have never included meals. therefore the expectation of a free meal on a bus or train does not arise.
Please fight your clients' corner fairly, not on a false premise.
Roy Romsey
Roy Romsey
